content:
That's a great idea! I'll make sure to set up a small photography area near the potting station with a beautiful backdrop, props, and good lighting. I'll also create a custom hashtag for my garden party and display it near the area. I think this will be a great way to encourage guests to take photos and share them on social media.

Speaking of social media, I was thinking of creating a small social media station where guests can share their experiences and photos from the party. Do you think that's a good idea?
